subject: [PERMANENT] README.md INFRA Visualization
description:
## User Intent (PT-v1)

Create a comprehensive, detailed, unambiguous ASCII visualization of the current `.claude/` INFRA codebase state in README.md. The purpose is for the user to accurately understand the current codebase state and provide feedback to Lead.

**Requirements:**
- GitHub-friendly format (renders well on GitHub)
- English-based with Korean annotations mixed in
- Exhaustive coverage of all .claude/ infrastructure components
- No ambiguity — every component clearly documented

## Codebase Impact Map

### Primary Target
- `README.md` — complete rewrite to reflect INFRA v9.0 state

### Source Components (read-only, inventory)
- `.claude/CLAUDE.md` — Team Constitution v9.0 (~378L)
- `.claude/agents/*.md` — 42 agent files (35 workers + 8 coordinators)
- `.claude/hooks/` — 4 hook scripts (~220L total)
- `.claude/references/` — protocol documents (agent-catalog, gate-evaluation-standard, ontological-lenses, coordinator-shared-protocol, etc.)
- `.claude/skills/` — 10 skill directories
- `.claude/settings.json` — MCP and tool settings (~84L)
- `.claude/projects/` — project-specific memory
- `.agent/observability/` — RTD system

## Architecture Decisions
(none yet — Phase 1)

## Phase Status
- Phase 0: COMPLETE
- Phase 1: PENDING

## Constraints
- Output: single file (README.md)
- Must be GitHub-renderable markdown
- English primary, Korean secondary
